TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8655=On 11/14/2014, Nouveau Ventures Inc. announced that they will be unable to file their next 10-Q by the deadline required by the SEC., 9133=On August 23, 2014, on closing of the Technology Acquisition Agreement, David St. James was appointed as the company’s Vice President and a Director of SaaSMax. David St. James, 41, is an inventor and businessman based in Las Vegas, Nevada. He has been involved in various aspects of the automotive industry, including product development, service and repair. Mr. St. James is currently a director, Secretary and Treasurer of Homeland Resources Ltd. Mr. St. James was the president and a director of XLR Medical Corp. from January 2009 to January 2012., 4800=Nouveau Ventures Inc., a development stage company, focuses on marketing, selling, and distributing a propane diesel dual fuel retrofit system. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in La Crescenta, California., 8189=On 03/31/2015, Nouveau Ventures Inc. announced that they will be unable to file their next 10-K by the deadline required by the SEC.}
